alert.note: Alert for McPherson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 5:46PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern McPherson County through 615 PM CDT... At 546 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Inman, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Inman. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 54 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
